posts.author: friedpiggy
posts.content:
Hi all.

Long time NWN player, but new to the Arelith server so some help would be appreciated.

I am looking for a Ranger archer build. Following the build request guidlines, here is what I need

1) PvE build. I dont plan on doing any PvP if I can help it as I generally suck at it.
2) Level Cap - 30
3) Race - Elf
4) Class - Ranger. I dont mind multiclassing, but there is a minimum 3 level requirement for any second classes. i.e. the first 3 levels of second class need to be taken one after the other and you need a minimum of 3 levels in that secondary class
5) Ranged Longbow prefered. Maybe with a rapier for those times when you get swarmed.
6) Dex prefered over WIS wrt to ranged stat.
7) Longbow (bit of a silly question this)
8) Arelith is a low magic world. +3 on items/weapons is max
9) Spells will be ranger spells as needed. no need to focus on the casting side of things.
10) Custom factors = I plan taking the Sniper path, this removes the rangers dual wield feats and replaces them with Called Shot, Point Blank Shot and Rapid Shot. There is thus no need to include these feats in the build. If at all possible, a list of what to take as FE would be appreciated as I am brand new to the server so am not sure on what racial types are the most common. 

Thanking you all in advance
Piggy

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
friedpiggy wrote:
That does look ideal. Any suggestions regarding FE? (re: Empyre's 15/15 sniper build)

Edit : Nvm Since you only get 4 of them I think taking the 3 crit immune ones and also Bane would be the way to go.

 
Traditionally, your first FEs would be vs. the most common races, like dwarf (duergar), elf (drow), human, etc.  Vs. crit immune is also a strategy used by many but if constructs, undead and elementals are rare, well.. then... what's the actual benefit?  Maybe network the folks on the server to get a feel for the race bias because unless Arelith furnishes a releveler, your choice(s) will be permanent.

Dunno what you mean by "Bane".  If you are referring to Bane of Enemies, that feat requires an epic ranger (i.e. over 20 levels) and that is not part of Empyre's build.  Then again, some of these custom servers change feat requirements (like the non-arcane AA that Arelith offers), but if that is the case, you should declare that in your request info.
